As a digital artist it felt right. Apple pen still works better, but the iPad has nothing on that display and the dial is sweet. The display is seriously incredible. This is definitely targeting a specific professional artist group, curious to how it adapts over time for the average user. BTW Im an apple person, you got my attention with this product. Apple never asked me to use drivers for 3rd party products..","time":"1477541049"},{"author":{"alias":"sito.sanchez.5","id":"530653715","name":"Sito Snchez","url":""},"entity":[],"is_female":"0","is_friend":"","likes_count":"0","text":"Microsoft son unos ESTAFADORES y LADRONES. Ped un reemplazo de mi Surface Pro 4 en garanta y me enviaron otra. Despus de que han recibido la ma,  me han cobrado la nueva 1079€, y la ma se la han quedado. Me puse en contacto con el servicio tecnico y me dice que estaba daada, le pregunto que tipo de dao tenia, ya que estaba perfecta y la cambiaba porque fallaba el wifi al conectar dispositivos Usb, y me dice que no hay ms detalles en la ficha. Le digo que si esta daada cmo ellos dicen que me lo demuestren, y que me la devuelvan, ya que es ma y yo la e pagado. Y me dice que lo siente mucho pero una vez entran en el servicio ya no es posible reenviarmela. Le pido que me pase con alguien del servicio o me de un nmero de telfono y me dice que no hay servicio para esto. O sea que tu les mandas una Surface que esta bien, pero ellos dicen que esta daada, y se la quedan, te cobran la nueva haciendote un cargo en tu tarjeta sin avisar y sin tu consentimiento y no puedes hacer nada ni reclamar nada. Es increble que esto lo este haciendo una empresa como Microsoft. He pagado 2 Surface y tengo una. Adems la nueva tiene problemas de pantalla. Solo quiero que me devuelvan mi dinero que me han cobrado sin mi consentimiento ni aviso, y me devuelvan mi Surface. Son unos ladrones. Both would encourage them to seek gainful employment, and encourage potential employers to hire qualified blind people. GRRAHHH.","time":"1464829022"}],"comments_count":"121","likes_count":"583","page_id":"20528438720","post_content":"Dona Sarkar takes the torch for the Windows Insider ProgramAs the new head of the Windows Insider Program, Dona Sarkar will use feedback from millions of customers to build the products of the future. news.microsoft.com","post_id":"10153739547808721","publish_time":"1464803016","shares_count":"64","text":"For her, the operating system is the digital heartbeat that powers creativity and achievement."},{"comments":[{"author":{"alias":"johnny.brennan.75","id":"1419970873","name":"Johnny Brennan","url":""},"entity":[],"is_female":"0","is_friend":"","likes_count":"5","text":"Thats exactly why nobody Tunes in anymore; nothing but commercials and annoying interruptions, very little to do with racing, extremely boring.","time":"1464628611"},{"author":{"alias":"Mortinox","id":"507497787","name":"Brian Preston","url":""},"entity":[],"is_female":"0","is_friend":"","likes_count":"12","text":"This exciting race interrupted for an update restart. When it returns there will be audio but no video, as windows has decided the video card being used would work better with the wrong driver.","time":"1464586812"}],"comments_count":"95","likes_count":"1108","page_id":"20528438720","post_content":"Microsoft Cloud powers 100th running of the Indy 500This new app empowers race fans with real-time race data including track conditions, tire performance, speeds and times from 9 sections around the track.beta.racecontrol.indycar.com","post_id":"10153730295083721","publish_time":"1464544800","shares_count":"146","text":"Follow every turn from anywhere during The Greatest Spectacle in Racing."},{"comments":[{"author":{"alias":"john.brocksmith.98","id":"100000397037393","name":"John Brocksmith","url":""},"entity":[],"is_female":"0","is_friend":"","likes_count":"63","text":"05/26/16
Dear Microsoft - 
NO means NO! Not now, maybe later or maybe never but NO means NO! @ least I thought it did or should!

While I was sleeping, you forced your Windows 10 Upgrade (GWX) on me & my PC! You violated my privacy & trust! You forced this on me, without my permission...kind of like someone telling you they dont want to go out with you...then you stalk them or no, I dont want to have sex with you...then you rape them! 

Luckily, I can revert my system back to the older OS Im accustomed to, hopefully without any problems. I will also install preventive measures on all of my PC’s to keep the “forced upgrade” @ bay until I’m good & ready! I’ve been a PC user longer than most of your employees have been alive.

As I stated previously, I will install GWX when I’m ready & not before! It’s my choice not yours & if you continue to force my hand with trickery, my hands may be resting on the keyboards of Mac’s in the future! 

Sincerely,
John Brocksmith","time":"1464257938"},{"author":{"alias":"thomas.dillon","id":"507492225","name":"Tom Dillon","url":""},"entity":[],"is_female":"0","is_friend":"","likes_count":"114","text":"I have been a Microsoft Developer for over 30 years and I support many Windows users.  This FORCED upgrade to Windows 10, without concern for the end user is an unforgivable violation of trust. Windows 10 BREAKS some legacy applications which are mission-critical to the end users.  Microsoft has no right to FORCE an upgrade by changing the meaning of the little x in the upper right corner. For almost a year, you have trained users to close the Microsoft Virus Upgrade to Windows 10 notification by clicking the x at the top right. NOW, with the latest attempt to get users to do something that the user has been avoiding, you have CHANGED the meaning of closing your advertisement. Now, clicking the upper right x means sure, upgrade me now. What the F are you thinking Microsoft?","time":"1464239090"}],"comments_count":"130","likes_count":"223","page_id":"20528438720","post_content":"","post_id":"10153726149143721","publish_time":"1464205601","shares_count":"57","text":"Gabriel Pulecio’s art isn’t complete without an audience. Using Microsoft Kinect, he creates mesmerizing pieces that mimic human interaction."},{"comments":[{"author":{"alias":"diane.watson.1466","id":"679282111","name":"Diane Watson","url":""},"entity":[],"is_female":"1","is_friend":"","likes_count":"34","text":"I dont think people give a rip about your travels, lol... I think people dont like your tactics or your products. Target  is learning the hard way...Microsoft may be next.","time":"1464151415"},{"author":{"alias":"sue.cruse.5","id":"1316808133","name":"Sue Cruse","url":""},"entity":[],"is_female":"1","is_friend":"","likes_count":"50","text":"Dirty tactics hijacking my computer to windows 10 without our permission, my husband was in the middle of business stuff then the upgrade happened, this was the last of my computers that was Windows the rest are Apple this one for will be replaced with Apple too, done with Microsoft after this!!!!","time":"1464198172"}],"comments_count":"106","likes_count":"178","page_id":"20528438720","post_content":"Microsoft on InstagramThe official Instagram account of Microsoft. Celebrating people who use technology to break boundaries and achieve more.Open Linkwww.instagram.com","post_id":"10153724775288721","publish_time":"1464138729","shares_count":"22","text":"Join Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella as he chronicles his travels across Asia on our Instagram channel. http://msft.it/6185BqPpD"}]],"status":"success"}

We are also serious about building software for companies, but we dont call ourselves an enterprise software company. Our friends Reid Hoffman and Michelle Yee just announced theyre joining the movement and committing $20 million to support the Chan Zuckerberg Biohub in its mission to help cure all diseases in our childrens lifetime.  The Biohub has already started working on two big projects. The Human Cell Atlas will be a detailed map of all cells that control the bodys major organs. The Infectious Disease Initiative will create new tools for fighting diseases lik...e HIV, Ebola and Zika. All of these tools will be available to the whole scientific community to accelerate progress on some of the most important questions in science and medicine. When Priscilla and I announced our science initiative in September, we hoped more people would realize that its possible to cure all diseases -- and get them involved in making it happen.  Reid and Michelle’s gift will go towards bringing even more of the best scientists and engineers together at the Biohub as we work to create a better world for our children. Im grateful for their friendship and support. Voting is one of our great responsibilities as citizens in a democracy. Thats why youve probably seen us actively encouraging everyone who can vote, to go vote. Youll see a lot more reminders to vote until the election. So far, more than 2 million people have registered to vote by going through Facebook, some for the first time, according to estimates based on available... data. This makes it one of the largest voter registration programs in history. This cycle, weve shown 150 million people old enough to vote a link to register right in our app. At least 16 states saw voter registration spikes during these campaigns compared to the day before -- in some cases increasing registrations by 23x! Were now running a similar campaign to encourage people to actually go out and vote. Based on our estimates, we hope to encourage millions of people who might otherwise stay home to get engaged on election day. We also created the Election Hub, where you can get directions to your polling place, learn about your local candidates and ballot measures, and share that youve voted to encourage your friends to vote too. Check it out at: facebook.com/elections/us2016 Ive always believed real change comes from giving every person a voice. When I first started Facebook, I hoped one day we could help people build movements to create change. I still believe this today. Our community is a platform for all ideas. The people who registered through Facebook will vote for all candidates. Our mission is to give everyone the power to share, so each of you can help create the change you want to see in the world. Please make your voice heard and go vote. Our community now has 1.8 billion people. We hit the milestone of 1.2 billion people using our apps every day. Our biggest focus has been putting video first across our apps. People are creating and sharing more video than ever, so were building new tools to make it easier to express yourself in creative ways.... The number of people going Live on Facebook at any moment has grown by 4x since May. We launched Instagram Stories less than 3 months ago, and already more than 100 million people are using it every day. Were also building a brand new camera across our apps and well be adding even more visual messaging tools over the next few months. Our community has a lot to be proud of this quarter. Thanks for being a part of this journey to connect the world. See more","with":[]}],"status":"success"}

[{"page_id":"20528438720","post_id":"10154144629223721","likes_count":"825","comments_count":"49","shares_count":"75","publish_time":"1478280286","text":"The Verge goes hands on with Surface Studio.","post_content":"Microsofts new Surface Studio is a stunning desktop computerA one-of-a-kind hinge and a tangible dial are only two of the new features.theverge.com|By Dan Seifert","comments":[{"text":"Tried it, spent over an hour in store drawing with it, loved it. Feels like a first version of course, but very excited about the next generation though. You can also hook up another machine from what I was told so that is a huge advantage. As a digital artist it felt right. Apple pen still works better, but the iPad has nothing on that display and the dial is sweet. The display is seriously incredible. This is definitely targeting a specific professional artist group, curious to how it adapts over time for the average user. BTW Im an apple person, you got my attention with this product. Want to send me a demo kit Microsoft?","author":{"id":"57501926","name":"Chase Cooper","url":""},"is_friend":"","time":"1478379754","is_female":"0","likes_count":"5"},{"text":"Meh old GPU over priced for what it is and the mediocre crappy Microsoft support... but they do give free (nonalcoholic) drinks when youre in store for support.... this is a good thing to know being youll spend quite a bit of time there till your warranty runs out....","author":{"id":"564182157","name":"Joshua Joshy","url":""},"is_friend":"","time":"1478453190","is_female":"0","likes_count":"7"}]},{"page_id":"20528438720","post_id":"10154142219248721","likes_count":"2259","comments_count":"87","shares_count":"930","publish_time":"1478208936","text":"Whats it like to swing through outer space?  Starfield by Lab212 is currently on exhibit at MuDA. Powered by Microsoft Kinect, visitors can now explore the universe from a completely new perspective.","post_content":"","comments":[{"text":"When I was a child, I loved to swing and would close my eyes and imagine that, on an upswing, I would just keep going and fly through space.","author":{"id":"1577749537","name":"Gina Glassman","url":""},"is_friend":"","time":"1478233801","is_female":"1","likes_count":"11"},{"text":"Heres the problem Microsoft; youre goofing off with swings in the employee lounge while your users are stuck with computers broken by a combination of bugs and programmer arrogance in your infamous Anniversary Update.

Nvidia has newer, faster, much more efficient models out. Im not going to spend that kind of money on outdated, slower, power-hungry tech. Id rather build my own tower so I can swap out the components when needed. But I would love that display as a standalone monitor . The dial concept is a great idea. Hopefully you patented it so Apple cant steal it. Thank you for not being afraid of innovation and taking a chance on this new platform.","author":{"id":"100000681895852","name":"Richard Zavala","url":""},"is_friend":"","time":"1477692598","is_female":"0","likes_count":"34"},{"text":"Please please please consider making this display available as a stand-alone peripheral. I need the freedom and upgradability of having a full tower for my desktop workstation.","author":{"id":"584931665","name":"Nelson Ocampo","url":""},"is_friend":"","time":"1477679687","is_female":"0","likes_count":"57"}]},{"page_id":"20528438720","post_id":"10154118293763721","likes_count":"182","comments_count":"26","shares_count":"0","publish_time":"1477520384","text":"","post_content":"102,768 ViewsSurface was live.26 October at 15:06 · Behind the scenes at the #MicrosoftEvent","comments":[{"text":"I see Microsoft is releasing a new Surface Pro ..... taking the consumers hard earned money but will not stand behind their current products. Purchased my Pro 3 a little over a year ago, currently on my 3rd warranty replacement because the software will not update and the unit will not charge at 100%. Technicians tell me Microsoft is very much aware and they are working on a fix, over a year waiting for this fix. They did extend my warranty but what was the purpose if all replacements have the same issue. Very expensive paper weight.","author":{"id":"100000439296198","name":"Katea Johnson","url":""},"is_friend":"","time":"1477757979","is_female":"1","likes_count":"0"},{"text":"My xbox one died over night. Positive it was the update that fried my software. Now they want me to pay for refurbished replacement. Jackasses. Going to Playstation and my undecided friends are with me. Consoles a little over a year old. Screw you Microsoft.","author":{"id":"1343376366","name":"Kenneth Lopez","url":""},"is_friend":"","time":"1477587798","is_female":"0","likes_count":"2"}]},{"page_id":"20528438720","post_id":"10154117682908721","likes_count":"1385","comments_count":"54","shares_count":"234","publish_time":"1477504376","text":"Ten things we announced today: http://msft.it/MSFTEvent16","post_content":"","comments":[{"text":"You announced 10 awesome things but you failed to announce the ONE thing that I would say most of your customers are looking for and that is a SURFACE PHONE!!! I mean Jesus, we have been waiting for years and you continue to stay mum about the whole subject. If you truly are waiting for the new Intel Kaby Lake processor thats fine. I want the best hardware in the phone as possible but for the love of God at least give us some kind of indication that youre working on it for a release next year or the next. Very disappointed you spent most of your time show casing a product that is becoming extinct, the desktop. News flash, the tech world is in SMARTPHONES and tablets, not inconvenient (and way overpriced) desktops. This Microsoft fan is growing tired of waiting for a Windows Phone and about ready to buy an Android since youre taking away the option to even buy your Lumias.","author":{"id":"742500187","name":"Andy Sabin","url":""},"is_friend":"","time":"1477518134","is_female":"0","likes_count":"8"},{"text":"Congrats! Get the Microsoft HoloLens Development Edition. http://bit.ly/1PgH5vb","comments":[{"text":"I have just about had it with Microsoft.

While on support chat and the phone for almost two hours yesterday with 5 different people working on getting a solution to an Office365 2016 problem that DOES NOT EXIST on Office365 2013, I heard the support specialists say:

Your problem is because your computer is on a domain.  During the remote support session I asked her what indicates that it is on a domain, she pointed to the Workgroup.  I pointed out to her that I dont have a domain controller at home - just an old workgroup.  Didnt matter, I was on a domain.

Another support tech said the problem was the email servers.  I pointed out to him that one of the servers was live.com.  So I told him to fix the server.  I also pointed out to him that the other computer, running same OS, connected to same email servers, running Office365 2013, WAS WORKING FINE.

Didnt matter, its the servers fault.

I have PTSD as a result of this trauma. Im currently living on a disablity fixed income. I am very grateful for this income and for having such amazingly supportive people in my life. Im also grateful for Flynn, my service dog. before him I spent 3 years locked away inside our home, only leaving for medical appointments. Going into a costco or public crowd would have been unimaginable before him. Now that Flynns gotten me out of the house and actively engaged in the community, I would like to give back in a meaningful way.

Ive been attending Ashford University for the past year and my long term goal is to earn a masters degree in psychology. I know what its like to have  a psychological disorder and would like to help others with their struggles. Im currently a straight A student and working hard in school as well as on my personal recovery. Ive already earned a partial scholarship, but it is very limited. Im asking for help with college tuition and possibly a reliable car to do my clinical rotations later down the road. My goal is to be a functional part of society again. I believe its possible 
with enough hard work and determination. 

Also as a result of my own trauma, my wife and I are working on being able to foster children with early childhood trauma and Complex PTSD. The education will also help understand the special needs of these children and help offer them a better quality of life. Thank you so much for any help. Every little bit counts and it is all very much appreciated.

Ariela Suster left El Salvador to pursue an education in the US, she knew she would some day find a way to bridge the distance between her new and old homes. A career in the fashion publishing industry led her to create Sequence Collection  a line of handcrafted accessories made in El Salvador by local youth. Ariela’s mission is to disrupt the cycle of violence that limits at risk youth by providing skills training and technology education to her employees. She runs her business from a Microsoft Surface, using Skype, OneNote, and Office to juggle it all. A few days ago, we even gave her a chance to try out the new Surface Book! (introduced yesterday)","post_content":"","comments":[{"text":"Surface pro 3 has problems with the USB port.  Erik with Microsoft tech support told me they would not honor their warranty.  He was smug and rude.","author":{"id":"100001558922600","name":"Cody Mock","url":""},"is_friend":"","time":"1451780422","is_female":"0","likes_count":"0"},{"text":"Today I learned that if one buys anything from #microsoft and then need support, you are on your own! I have the product key in box from microsoft and their tech support still cant install he product. No one speaks english at their customer support. 4 hrs on the phone and still no help. I feel like I got robbed from my original copy of #office All I did was to change computers. Microsoft and office costomer service was terrible! I thought Comcast was worse until I talked to Microsoft today!","author":{"id":"100001940911952","name":"Jim Schaper","url":""},"is_friend":"","time":"1449368846","is_female":"0","likes_count":"0"}]},{"page_id":"20528438720","post_id":"10153252264298721","likes_count":"3001","comments_count":"232","shares_count":"726","publish_time":"1444152578","text":"RECAP: All the announcements from todays # Windows10devices   event in one handy blog post: http://msft.it/Windows10devices","post_content":"","comments":[{"text":"Bravo on the Surface Book, seriously looking at getting one. Might even look at one of the Lumia phones too, very impressive. And this is coming from a 20+ year Apple user.","author":{"id":"776339727","name":"Thomas Coulton","url":""},"is_friend":"","time":"1444154081","is_female":"0","likes_count":"14"},{"text":"Microsofts event was more exciting then apples, hands down.","author":{"id":"100010080857580","name":"Jeremy Smith","url":""},"is_friend":"","time":"1444153549","is_female":"0","likes_count":"138"}]},{"page_id":"20528438720","post_id":"10153252223438721","likes_count":"5722","comments_count":"265","shares_count":"1266","publish_time":"1444148203","text":"When there are no limits to what your devices can do, there are no limits to what you can do with them. Learn more: http://msft.it/Windows10devices","post_content":"","comments":[{"text":"Absolutely made up with todays announcements. Hololens looks an incredible companion for the Xbox and really will bring virtual reality gaming to the world. The Band 2 has finally got me itching to have a smartwatch on my wrist. The new range of Surface devices are just pure objects of beauty.

And as for the new Lumia 950s... Cant wait to get myself, finally worthy successor to my legendary Lumia 920. Ive been out of contract for 8 months waiting for this, so glad I swerved the 830 and 930. The 950 is a complete revolution, and its not often you see that in the mobile world! If I had a wishlist for a mobile phone, the 950 ticks every single box (with the exception of the 42MP sensor from the 1020 but thats far too niche!). Amen!","author":{"id":"100000604017967","name":"Matt Cullum","url":""},"is_friend":"","time":"1444166014","is_female":"0","likes_count":"4"},{"text":"Microsoft - - it is absolutely unbelievable that you are making the new 950 and 950xl phones exclusive to AT&T only!!!  Have you lost your everlovin mind?!?!?","author":{"id":"100000765021445","name":"Theron Johnson","url":""},"is_friend":"","time":"1444173728","is_female":"0","likes_count":"13"}]}]

Dear Microsoft - 
NO means NO! Not now, maybe later or maybe never but NO means NO! @ least I thought it did or should!

While I was sleeping, you forced your Windows 10 Upgrade (GWX) on me & my PC! You violated my privacy & trust! You forced this on me, without my permission...kind of like someone telling you they dont want to go out with you...then you stalk them or no, I dont want to have sex with you...then you rape them! 

Luckily, I can revert my system back to the older OS Im accustomed to, hopefully without any problems. I will also install preventive measures on all of my PC’s to keep the “forced upgrade” @ bay until I’m good & ready! I’ve been a PC user longer than most of your employees have been alive.

As I stated previously, I will install GWX when I’m ready & not before! It’s my choice not yours & if you continue to force my hand with trickery, my hands may be resting on the keyboards of Mac’s in the future! 

Sincerely,
John Brocksmith","time":"1464257938"},{"author":{"alias":"thomas.dillon","id":"507492225","name":"Tom Dillon","url":""},"entity":[],"is_female":"0","is_friend":"","likes_count":"114","text":"I have been a Microsoft Developer for over 30 years and I support many Windows users.  This FORCED upgrade to Windows 10, without concern for the end user is an unforgivable violation of trust. Windows 10 BREAKS some legacy applications which are mission-critical to the end users.  Microsoft has no right to FORCE an upgrade by changing the meaning of the little x in the upper right corner. For almost a year, you have trained users to close the Microsoft Virus Upgrade to Windows 10 notification by clicking the x at the top right. NOW, with the latest attempt to get users to do something that the user has been avoiding, you have CHANGED the meaning of closing your advertisement. Now, clicking the upper right x means sure, upgrade me now. What the F are you thinking Microsoft?","time":"1464239090"}],"comments_count":"130","likes_count":"223","page_id":"20528438720","post_content":"","post_id":"10153726149143721","publish_time":"1464205601","shares_count":"57","text":"Gabriel Pulecio’s art isn’t complete without an audience. Theres a helluva lot more FAKE and INCORRECT junk on  my newfeed than 1%","time":"1479007219"},{"author":{"alias":"","id":"4","name":"Mark Zuckerberg","url":""},"entity":[],"is_female":"0","is_friend":"","likes_count":"1248","text":"Yes, its one of the largest voter registration programs in history!","time":"1479014417"},{"author":{"alias":"","id":"4","name":"Mark Zuckerberg","url":""},"entity":[],"is_female":"0","is_friend":"","likes_count":"3942","text":"People share and read a lot of news on Facebook, so we feel a great responsibility to handle that as well as we can. But remember that Facebook is mostly about helping people stay connected with friends and family. News and media are not the primary things people do on Facebook, so I find it odd when people insist we call ourselves a news or media company in order to acknowledge its importance. We are also serious about building software for companies, but we dont call ourselves an enterprise software company. And we are serious about building planes to beam internet access, but we dont call ourselves an aerospace company. We care deeply about all these things. We are a technology company because the main thing we do across many products is engineer and build technology to enable all these things.","time":"1479014141"},{"author":{"alias":"","id":"4","name":"Mark Zuckerberg","url":""},"entity":[],"is_female":"0","is_friend":"","likes_count":"1480","text":"The research shows that people are actually exposed to more diverse content on Facebook and social media than on traditional media like newspapers and TV. Thats because you most likely only read a few newspapers or watch a few TV networks for news (and therefore only see a few viewpoints), whereas on Facebook almost everyone has friends with different viewpoints. Even if 90% of your friends vote for the same candidates, come from the same background or belong to the religion as you, that still means 10% of your friends will have different views and you will see those viewpoints in your feed.","time":"1479014645"},{"author":{"alias":"","id":"4","name":"Mark Zuckerberg","url":""},"entity":[],"is_female":"0","is_friend":"","likes_count":"13137","text":"The stat I mentioned is across the whole system. Depending on which pages you personally follow and who your friends are, you may see more or less. The power of Facebook is that you control what you see by who you choose to connect with.","time":"1479009792"}],"comments_count":"15804","drinking":[],"from":[],"in":[],"instagram_url":"","likes_count":"193255","location":[],"post_content":"","post_id":"10103253901916271","post_info":{"album":"","photo_id":"0","post_id":"10103253901916271","video_id":"0"},"publish_time":"1478999736","shares_count":"14736","text":"I want to share some thoughts on Facebook and the election. Assuming that people understand what is important in their lives and that they can express those views has driven not only our community, but democracy overall. Sometimes when people use their voice though, they say things that seem wrong and they support people you disagree with. Something Ive always tried to accomplish as well. All the love to your family.","time":"1478800197"},{"author":{"alias":"ShameeCoolOfficial","id":"100010011704292","name":"Shamith Perera","url":""},"entity":[],"is_female":"0","is_friend":"","likes_count":"498","text":"Mark Zuckerberg Sir,
I am Shamith from Colombo, Sri Lanka, a positive thinker. I would like to put a proposal in your multi-tasking brain.
Sir, please create an icon on the cover page (make it optional / mandatory) naming or indicating “Blood Group” visible to all.
You know many people are being hospitalized every moment. Many of them are dying in need of matched blood especially rare blood groups. So, if you mention Blood Group on Facebook, many people will be being benefited while you will be dreaming on the bed. And I think you will ,of course, want it.
I know I am a tiny member of your Facebook world but my requirement is definitely a big one.
You are always with the betterment of the human being people know so. Form that courage, I am eagerly waiting for not to be neglected.
I hope you will read my message and at least reply (positively).
Thank you sir!!

Writer Credits - Rabiul Islam","time":"1478802527"}],"comments_count":"5013","drinking":[],"from":[],"in":[],"instagram_url":"","likes_count":"135894","location":[],"post_content":"","post_id":"10103247258569591","post_info":{"album":"a.529237706231.2034669.4","photo_id":"10103247255031681","post_id":"0","video_id":"0"},"publish_time":"1478792939","shares_count":"4569","text":"Time for more science! Our friends Reid Hoffman and Michelle Yee just announced theyre joining the movement and committing $20 million to support the Chan Zuckerberg Biohub in its mission to help cure all diseases in our childrens lifetime.  The Biohub has already started working on two big projects. The Human Cell Atlas will be a detailed map of all cells that control the bodys major organs. The Infectious Disease Initiative will create new tools for fighting diseases lik...e HIV, Ebola and Zika. All of these tools will be available to the whole scientific community to accelerate progress on some of the most important questions in science and medicine. When Priscilla and I announced our science initiative in September, we hoped more people would realize that its possible to cure all diseases -- and get them involved in making it happen.  Reid and Michelle’s gift will go towards bringing even more of the best scientists and engineers together at the Biohub as we work to create a better world for our children. Im grateful for their friendship and support. You can see Reids note here: https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/symbiosis-biohub-reid-hoffman See more","with":[]},{"at":[],"author":{"alias":"zuck","id":"","name":"Mark Zuckerberg","url":"https://www.facebook.com/zuck"},"comments":[{"author":{"alias":"g","id":"1305210","name":"Bobby Goodlatte","url":""},"entity":[{"id":"717545176","type":"user","url":"https://www.facebook.com/sheryl"}],"is_female":"0","is_friend":"","likes_count":"294","text":"Facebooks Election Guide this cycle was fantastic. Shes got a lot of election nights ahead of her.  Holding Max, I thought about all the work ahead of us to create the world we want for our children. This work is bigger than any presidency and progress does not move in a straight line. The most important opportunities of Maxs generation -- like curing all disease, improving education, connecting everyone and promoting equal opportunity -- will take long term focus and finding new ways for all of us to work together, sometimes over decades. We are all blessed to have the ability to make the world better, and we have the responsibility to do it. Lets go work even harder.","with":[]},{"at":[],"author":{"alias":"zuck","id":"","name":"Mark Zuckerberg","url":"https://www.facebook.com/zuck"},"comments":[{"author":{"alias":"","id":"100010946280441","name":"Matthew Boux","url":""},"entity":[{"id":"616202895216402","type":"page","url":"https://www.facebook.com/Mattsasdjourney/"}],"is_female":"0","is_friend":"","likes_count":"1291","text":"Mark Zuckerberg you are an amazing person. I am so glad you decided to create Facebook. Im not sure if you will see this but if you do, I just wanted to thank you for all that you have done. There are so many people and communities that create positive change through Facebook. Im creating change through my autism blog Matthews Autism Journey ( and if anyone sees this I would be so glad if you would give our blog a like )

Voting is one of our great responsibilities as citizens in a democracy. Thats why youve probably seen us actively encouraging everyone who can vote, to go vote. Youll see a lot more reminders to vote until the election. So far, more than 2 million people have registered to vote by going through Facebook, some for the first time, according to estimates based on available... data. This makes it one of the largest voter registration programs in history. This cycle, weve shown 150 million people old enough to vote a link to register right in our app. At least 16 states saw voter registration spikes during these campaigns compared to the day before -- in some cases increasing registrations by 23x! Were now running a similar campaign to encourage people to actually go out and vote. Based on our estimates, we hope to encourage millions of people who might otherwise stay home to get engaged on election day. We also created the Election Hub, where you can get directions to your polling place, learn about your local candidates and ballot measures, and share that youve voted to encourage your friends to vote too. Check it out at: facebook.com/elections/us2016 Ive always believed real change comes from giving every person a voice. When I first started Facebook, I hoped one day we could help people build movements to create change. I still believe this today. Our community is a platform for all ideas. The people who registered through Facebook will vote for all candidates. Our mission is to give everyone the power to share, so each of you can help create the change you want to see in the world. Please make your voice heard and go vote. People are creating and sharing more video than ever, so were building new tools to make it easier to express yourself in creative ways.... The number of people going Live on Facebook at any moment has grown by 4x since May. We launched Instagram Stories less than 3 months ago, and already more than 100 million people are using it every day.
